title: Hello World!

content:
I will try to update this list regularly. Progress: 15/65
✔️ Start a blog post
✔️ Live in another country
❌ Pass JLPT N1 (my 3th language) 💮
❌ Carry a conversation in French (my 4th language)
✔️ Work in world’s largest campus (Station F)
✔️ Work in world’s top big-tech company
✔️ Become the first author of a paper at a top-tier conference
✔️ Author a patent
❌ Get a PhD (in CS) 🎓
❌ Try another degree (maybe psychology)
❌ Teach a course
❌ Have a keynote talk
✔️ Go to a classical music performance 🎻
✔️ Go to my favorite artist’s concert (Ado) 💙
❌ Go to an opera 🎭
❌ Go to Comiket 🔞
❌ Learn archery 🏹
✔️ Go on a camping trip in the mountains 🏕
❌ Sleep outside on the beach, under the sky
❌ Take a hot spring bath ♨️
❌ Participate in a traditional tea ceremony 🍵
✔️ Play at a casino 🎰
❌ Watch a bullfight 🐮
❌ See auroras 🌌
❌ Ski ⛄️
❌ Scuba dive 🤿
❌ Fly a plane ✈️
❌ Take a hot air balloon ride
❌ Ride a horse 🐴
❌ Be in a submarine
❌ See a meteor shower ☄️
❌ Eat at 3-star Michelin restaurant
✔️ Have a Parisian breakfast 🥐
❌ Eat sushi in Japan 🍣
✔️ Eat pizza in Italy 🍕
✔️ Drink beer in Germany 🍻
❌ See a Broadway show in New York
❌ Ride a gondola in Venice
❌ Drink vodka in Russia
❌ Sail around the Caribbean ⛵️
❌ Carnival in Brazil
❌ Go on an African safari
❌ Surf in Haiwaii
❌ See morning glory cloud ☁️
❌ Go on a trip overseas with my whole family
❌ Visit 10 countries
❌ Visit 50 countries 🧳
❌ Visit 100 countries 🌏
❌ Learn to play chess ♟
❌ Get a driving lisence 🚗
✔️ Read 100 books (lol is this real?)
❌ Read 500 books 📖
❌ Read 1000 books 📚
❌ Play a music instrument 🎸
❌ Play the 2nd music instrument 🎹
❌ Write a song 🎵
❌ Have 10 videos on Youtube 🎬
✔️ Fall in love
❌ Get married to someone I love ❤️
❌ Build a home
❌ Have a cat 🐱
❌ Have a salad from my own garden 🥗
❌ Make a dessert 🧁
❌ Open a bakery 🍞
❌ Volunteer at a shrine/temple ⛩
We’re just living this moment.
On this path that we’ve chosen.
We’re like diamonds in starlight.
We shine in the dark night.
Cause we are the highlight.
title: List 100 things I want to do before I die
